login.title: login to your account
login.subtitle: We provide a home delivery service for fresh baladi bread to make your daily life easier. With a simple subscription process, you can have fresh baladi bread delivered right to your doorstep. Our service offers easy payment, excellent bread quality, and year-round delivery.

validation_auth.email_required: Email must be filled and include @
validation_auth.password_required: Password must be filled and include at least 6 characters

validation_contact_us.name_required: Name must be filled and include at least 2 characters
validation_contact_us.email_required: Email must be filled and include @
validation_contact_us.phone_required: Phone must be filled and include to 11 characters
validation_contact_us.message_required: Message must be filled and include at least 2 characters
